hero.languageMeetsLandIntro: I am a passionate Yoruba language consultant dedicated to preserving indigenous knowledge systems. Alongside my linguistic work, I run a thriving agricultural enterprise rooted in sustainable practices — raising livestock, cultivating crops, and producing the finest smoked fish using time-honoured traditions.
hero.serviceYorubaDesc: Offering translation, cultural education, and advisory services to help organisations and individuals engage authentically with Yoruba language and heritage. Preserving the beauty of Èdè Yorùbá for future generations.
hero.serviceAgricultureDesc: From cattle and poultry to maize and vegetables, our farm embraces diverse, sustainable methods. We combine traditional knowledge with modern practices to produce wholesome food for our communities.

consultation.title: Yoruba Language and Culture for International Learners
consultation.subtitle: Facilitates Yoruba training for legislative Houses, individual and organizations at all levels. Learn Yoruba with a certified guide. Sessions over video call.
consultation.description: One-on-one sessions with an experienced guide. Whether you're a beginner or advancing your fluency, we help you connect with Yoruba language and culture—from greetings and pronunciation to proverbs and cultural context. Translation, interpretation and all Yoruba language related services.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: The farm and the mission to share Yoruba language and culture globally.
about.farmText: Nestled in the heart of fertile lands, our farm represents generations of sustainable agricultural knowledge passed down through family traditions.
about.farmText2: Our farm spans generations of agricultural wisdom, where every seed planted carries the knowledge of our ancestors. We practice sustainable farming methods that honor both the land and the traditions passed down through time.
about.consultText: Beyond the fields, we nurture cultural connections, helping learners around the world discover the richness of Yoruba heritage.
about.consultText2: Language is more than words—it's a gateway to understanding culture, history, and identity. Our consultation services connect international learners with the beauty and depth of Yoruba language and culture.
about.missionText1: We believe in nourishing both body and spirit. Through sustainable agriculture and cultural education, we create bridges between generations, connecting people to their roots while embracing the future.
about.missionText2: Every product we grow and every lesson we teach is infused with intention, care, and respect for the wisdom of those who came before us.
